title.narrative: PROCOFSERVICES and P0220 for Civil Ser. Cap. Bldng. Liberia

description.narrative: This activity (PROCOFSERVICES and P0220 for Civil Ser. Cap. Bldng. Liberia) is a component of Civil Ser. Cap. Bldng. Liberia reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of Â£2,721,510. This component benefits Liberia, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International. The start date is 01-12-2006 and the end date is 31-03-2010.
